reviewText: This particular dvd from the series brings many issues to light. We do not fully realize what Jim Crow is all about until we can see it at it's worse  I am a baby boomer and heard numerous stories about it. Because if our current technology we can see the past as it is and it's true colors no pun intended. Valuable lessons for today's youth who have things too easy and don't understand what happened. Well worth seeing and having as part of ones library
